casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jermel Toron KRIDER 68A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2018 Emily H. Davis, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Krider, Jermel Toron.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Allison A. Angell, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of April 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of April 2018."

*173State of NC shall have up to and including the 7th day of May 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
